Shopify Profile Grid Section

Learn how to create a Profile Grid section with Sections Pro in Shopify

Description of the Section

The Profile Grid section is a sleek and customizable way to showcase team members, partners, or any group of individuals on your Shopify store. Using this section, you can display individual profiles with images, names, roles, and short backgrounds, all neatly organized in a responsive grid layout. The section is highly customizable, allowing you to tailor font styles, sizes, colors, and various dimensions according to your store's aesthetic.

Demo of the Section

Installation Instructions

  1. Download the Sections Pro app on the Shopify App Store
  2. Open the app and navigate to Free Sections
  3. Search for "Profile Grid"
  4. Click to Publish or Purchase

Sample Use Cases for a Shopify E-commerce Store

  • Meet the Team Page: Highlight your team members on an "About Us" page to foster a personal connection with your customers. Display each team member's role and a brief background to introduce your staff.
  • Brand Ambassadors: Showcase brand ambassadors or influencers who advocate for your products, along with a short bio and their role in promoting your brand.
  • Customer Testimonials: Use the Profile Grid to feature testimonials from satisfied customers, along with their pictures and a brief background of their experience with your products.
  • Vendor Partners: Highlight your key partners or suppliers, providing a visual representation and brief description of their contributions to your business.
  • Event Speakers: If your store is involved in events or webinars, display the profile of each speaker, including their name, role, and background information.

Overview of the Configuration Settings

  • Text Font: Choose the font for the text from a wide range of options.
  • Text Size: Adjust the size of the text between 10px and 50px.
  • Headline Font: Choose the font for the headlines.
  • Headline Size: Adjust the size of the headlines between 10px and 50px.
  • Background: Select the background color or gradient for the section.
  • Text Color: Choose a color for the text.
  • Max Width of Section: Define the maximum width of the section in pixels.
  • Gap Between Profiles: Set the gap between individual profile elements.
  • Padding Top: Define the padding at the top of the section.
  • Padding Bottom: Define the padding at the bottom of the section.
  • Padding Left: Define the padding on the left side of the section.
  • Padding Right: Define the padding on the right side of the section.
  • Element Spacing: Adjust the spacing between elements within each profile card.

These settings provide a flexible way to ensure the Profile Grid matches your store's design and layout preferences.
